meanings: (쓰레기 등을) throw away, throw out, dump, (informal) junk
(포기하다, 떠나다) desert, leave, abandon, (literary) forsake, give up

vlive.korean: 안돼 우리 죽어 - 가버려! No, we are going to die. - Go! 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: No, we are going to die. - Go!

vlive.korean: 다 들어오세요 - 나도 뒤로 갈래 아니면 앞으로 그냥 확! 가버려? Come on in. - Should I go to the back or the front? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 산을 넘어 산호세로 ~~❤
vlive.english: Come on in. - Should I go to the back or the front?

vlive.korean: "먹방", "먹방" 완전 먹방으로 그냥 가버려요? "Down for eating show". Do you want me to go for the eating show only? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 리노리방😺야식시간
vlive.english: "Down for eating show". Do you want me to go for the eating show only?
